content: the pale duck a hat inspired by the crazy christmas suit from hitman 3 the pale duck hat 2 yarn sport weight yarn in the following quantities white 80m/87 yards green 55m/60 yards red 30m/33 yards orange or yellow 1 5m/1 6 yards the sample hat was knitted in rauma finullgarn 175m/50g finull is a woollen-spun rustic norwegian yarn that knits up much more robustly and thickly than a worsted-spun merino yarn of the same yardage and weight needles circular needle 50cm/12 and set of double-pointed needles in size 3mm/us 2 5 gauge 28 sts = 10cm/4 over chart 1 blocked finished measurements height 20cm/7 8 circumference 51cm/20 will fit a 56cm/22 head abbreviations increase increase k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl rem remaining repeat repeat round round st s stitch es © lanja khon-engheim 2023 the pale duck hat 3 notes on construction to avoid jogs uneven stripes at the beginning of rounds i | | 61 use this jogless join method | 59 | the duck motif contains several sections with long floats 57 i lock floats using this method | 55 the ducks beaks are added with duplicate stitch 53 weaving in ends as you go is highly recommended 51 | 49 47 hat 45 with green cast on 140 sts on circular needle place marker 43 and join in a round work chart 1 around on round 23 41 marked with the ★ symbol increase 4 sts evenly spaced = 144 sts these incs are not shown on the chart 39 | 37 change to double-pointed needles when necessary = 120 sts after round 38 96 sts after round 49 72 sts after round 55 35 48 sts after round 58 24 sts after round 60 12 sts after 33 round 61 6 sts after round 62 31 draw up rem sts 29 27 embroider the ducks beaks using duplicate stitch 25 weave in ends block 23 ★ 21 19 17 15 13 11 k h h h h 9 h p h h h h 7 | k2tog h h h h 5 increase 4 sts evenly spaced on this ★ h h round these incs are not shown on h h 3 the chart h h h h 1 chart 1 instagram tynn_traad ravelry group newnorwegian substack jagged lines © lanja khon-engheim 2023
